projects.title: Our Projects | Innovative Mobile & Web Solutions - Quant apps
projects.description: Explore Quant apps's portfolio of mobile app development, CRM solutions, and web platforms that drive business success.

banner.title: Our projects
banner.subtitle: Innovation starts with a vision. Explore the exciting projects we've turned into reality!

header.title: At Quant-Apps
header.text: We take pride in collaborating with a diverse range of clients, crafting innovative digital solutions that drive business growth and success. Our experienced team brings creativity and technical expertise to every project we undertake.

items.title: God Eye App
items.description:
GodEye is our project — a next-generation app designed to help users protect their digital identity.
The app scans the internet and finds where your face or photos appear across public sources. With the Premium plan, GodEye provides advanced detection features that help you discover if your pictures are being reused or shared without your consent.

Our goal with GodEye is to give everyone the ability to see how their digital presence spreads online and take control over their personal content and privacy.

items.title: Kung-Fu Devices
items.description: We created a sleek and modern website for Kungfu Device, a brand specializing in next-generation electronic smoking devices. The platform presents the company’s product range, highlighting innovation, design, and user experience. With a minimalist layout and smooth navigation, the site effectively communicates the brand’s premium identity and provides customers with clear information about products and technology.

items.title: Shop Design
items.description: We designed a sleek and versatile website for Shop Design, an interior design studio that transforms commercial and residential spaces into inspiring environments. The platform showcases their full scope of services — from bespoke interiors and consultancy, to modular systems like their “Plug-in Wall” — with clarity, style, and visual impact. Thanks to our collaboration, the website reflects Shop Design’s commitment to aesthetics, functionality and innovation, while delivering an intuitive user experience.

items.title: Success Moving
items.description: We developed a professional website for Success Moving, a company specializing in residential and commercial relocation services. The platform highlights their comprehensive moving and clearing solutions, focusing on convenience, reliability, and customer satisfaction. With a clean design and intuitive navigation, the website effectively communicates the brand’s values and makes it easy for clients to request quotes or learn more about available services.

items.title: Restaurant Website
items.description: We developed a modern, user-friendly <services>corporate website development</services> for Roka Akor, ensuring seamless online reservations, an intuitive interface, and an elegant design that enhances customer engagement. The platform integrates high-quality visuals, responsive layouts, and a smooth dining experience for visitors. Learn more about our <process>web development methodology</process> that makes projects like this possible.

items.title: Perfect Garage
items.description: We developed a modern <services>website for the auto repair service</services> Perfect Garage, featuring online booking, service cost estimation, and intuitive navigation. Thanks to our <aboutUs>team</aboutUs>, the site is an effective tool for attracting clients and managing requests.

items.title: Aneta Interior
items.description: We designed a stylish <services>website for the interior design studio</services> Aneta Interior, focusing on visual content and aesthetics. The site showcases the project portfolio, services, and brand philosophy. Thanks to our <aboutUs>team</aboutUs>, the platform is elegant, responsive, and client-friendly.

items.title: Jurist
items.description: We developed a <services>web platform for legal services</services> — Jurist — where users can request consultations, explore services, and contact lawyers quickly. The site is intuitive, professional, and easy to navigate. Our <aboutUs>team</aboutUs> ensured fast performance, responsiveness, and simplicity.

items.title: Lens AI
items.description: Lens AI is your smart <services>iOS app development</services> for finding anything. With this app, you can take a photo or pick one from your gallery and find it online. Lens AI uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) to search the internet for you. You can learn about what you see in a picture, find where to buy things, and much more. See our <process>app development workflow</process> that helps us create intelligent and user-friendly applications.

items.title: Taste Ai
items.description: Meet your new kitchen helper, Taste Ai! This <services>cross platform app development</services> uses artificial intelligence (AI) to deliver recipes customized to your unique preferences and needs. If you're interested in joining our team to work on similar innovative <projects>AI-powered projects</projects>, check out our <careers>current job openings</careers>.

items.title: Keyboard AI
items.description: Introducing Keyboard AI - Your Ultimate Texting Companion! Transform your texting experience with Keyboard AI, the ultimate <services>build native mobile app</services> AI writing assistant that has your back whenever you need to text now! Unleash the power of Artificial Intelligence tools at your fingertips and make every message unique. Our <process>quality assurance process</process> ensures that every AI interaction is seamless and reliable.

header.title: At Quant-Apps
header.text: We take pride in collaborating with a diverse range of clients, crafting innovative digital solutions that drive business growth and success. Our experienced team ensures every project receives the attention to detail it deserves.

items.title: Consultation
items.text: We begin by deeply understanding your goals and needs. We listen to your ideas, analyze your business processes, and propose a strategy that will deliver maximum results for your <services>mobile app development</services> requirements. Check out our <projects>previous successful projects</projects> to see how our consultation process leads to exceptional outcomes.

items.title: Research and Strategy Development
items.text: We conduct thorough research, study the market and competitors to develop an effective strategy tailored to your unique <services>corporate website development</services> requirements and objectives. Our <aboutUs>expert strategists</aboutUs> are skilled at identifying opportunities that give your business a competitive edge.

items.title: Planning and Strategic Management
items.text: We plan every step towards success. We create detailed roadmaps and clearly define key milestones to ensure each phase of the <services>iOS app development</services> project is completed on time and within budget. Our <process>project management methodology</process> ensures transparent communication throughout the development lifecycle.

items.title: Branding and Identity Design
items.text: We create a unique visual identity that reflects the essence of your brand. We design logos, color palettes, and other branding elements to make your <services>android app development</services> brand easily recognizable and memorable. View our <projects>design portfolio</projects> to see examples of our branding work.

items.title: Wireframes and UI/UX Design
items.text: We design intuitive and attractive interfaces that provide the best user experience. We create wireframes and prototypes that lay the foundation for your future <services>web app development services</services> or website. Our talented designers work closely with our development team to ensure seamless implementation of design concepts.

items.title: Development and Integration
items.text: We develop functional, high-performance solutions that seamlessly integrate with your systems, ensuring smooth operation of <services>cross platform app development</services> and services. Our developers follow industry best practices and are constantly updating their skills. Interested in joining our development team? Check our <careers>current openings</careers>.

items.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
items.text: Every app and solution undergoes strict testing stages. We check all functional and technical aspects to ensure flawless performance of your <services>flutter app development company</services> projects across all devices and platforms. Our <process>quality assurance protocols</process> are designed to catch and fix issues before they reach your users.

items.title: Launch and Deployment
items.text: We carefully prepare your app for launch to ensure smooth operation. After testing, we deploy the <services>CRM development</services> solution on the selected platforms and ensure a seamless start. Learn more about our <aboutUs>team's expertise</aboutUs> in successful launch strategies.

items.title: Maintenance and Optimization
items.text: After the launch, we continue to support and optimize the app, improving its performance, fixing bugs, and adding new features to meet user needs for <services>ecommerce website development services</services> and other solutions. View our <projects>long-term partnership success stories</projects> to see how we help businesses grow over time.

We are committed to delivering exceptional results through collaboration, cutting-edge technology, and a passion for excellence. about.title: About Quant-Apps
about.paragraph1: At Quant-Apps, we transform bold ideas into high-performance apps and websites. Despite being a young company, our team combines years of experience with cutting-edge technology to deliver <services>custom android app development</services> solutions that exceed expectations.
about.paragraph2: We specialize in <services>mobile app development</services>, web design, and digital transformation, crafting visually stunning, high-functioning platforms that engage users and drive business growth. Our creative thinkers and technical experts work closely with clients, ensuring a collaborative, tailored approach for each project. Explore our <process>development methodology</process> to learn how we bring ideas to life.
about.paragraph4: Seamless communication, deep client engagement, and a commitment to long-term success. We don't just <services>build native mobile app</services> solutions—we create lasting digital experiences that help businesses thrive. Looking to join our team? Check out our <careers>current job openings</careers> for exciting opportunities.
about.paragraph5: Let's bring your vision to life with <services>custom software solutions</services> that elevate your brand and set you apart in the digital world. View our <projects>portfolio</projects> to see how we've helped other businesses achieve their goals.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy | Data Protection & Security - Quant apps
privacy-policy.description: Read Quant apps’s privacy policy to learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data across our digital solutions.
privacy-policy.intro: Quant-Apps ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services. By accessing our website or services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

acceptance.title: 1. Information We Collect
acceptance.content: We collect both personal and non-personal information to provide and improve our services. Personal Information. This includes any information you voluntarily provide, such as: Name, Email address, Phone number, Billing information, Any other information submitted through our contact forms or communication channels, Non-Personal Information. This includes automatically collected information such as: IP address, Browser type, Operating system, Pages viewed and time spent on our website, Device information

services.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
services.content:
We use the collected information for the following purposes: 
1) To provide and manage our services 
2) To communicate with you about your inquiries or projects 
3) To process payments and manage billing 
4) To improve and personalize your experience 
5) To analyze website usage and optimize performance 
6) To comply with legal obligations

intellectual.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
intellectual.content:
We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following circumstances: 
Service Providers: With trusted third-party vendors who assist us in providing our services, such as payment processors or hosting providers. 
Legal Compliance: When required by law or to protect our rights and interests. 
Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your information may be transferred.

conduct.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
conduct.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us recognize you and improve website functionality. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling cookies may limit certain features of our website.

disclaimer.title: 5. Data Security
disclaimer.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or destruction. However, no data transmission over the internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

liability.title: 6. Your Rights
liability.content:
Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information: 
Access your personal information and request a copy, 
Correct or update inaccurate information, 
Request deletion of your information, 
Object to processing or restrict processing of your information, 
Withdraw consent where processing is based on your consent, 
To exercise these rights, 
contact us at support@quant-apps.com.

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites.

termination.title: 8. Children’s Privacy
termination.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have inadvertently collected information from a child, please contact us to delete it.

governing.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
governing.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Effective Date." Your continued use of our services after changes are made indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content:
For any questions or concerns about these Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
Email: support@quant-apps.com
Moldova, Republic of

terms-of-use.title: Terms of Use | Legal Information & User Rights - Quant apps
terms-of-use.description: Review Quant apps’s terms of use to understand your rights and responsibilities when using our digital services.
terms-of-use.intro: Welcome to Quant-Apps! Please read these Terms of Use ("Terms") carefully before using our website and services. By accessing or using Quant-Apps ("we," "our," or "us"), you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our website or services, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old and agree to comply with these Terms. If you are accessing on behalf of a company, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind the company to these Terms.

services.title: 2. Services Provided
services.content: Quant-Apps offers IT development services, including mobile app development, UI/UX design, and software solutions. Any services provided will be subject to a separate agreement outlining the scope, deliverables, and terms of the engagement.

intellectual.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, trademarks, logos, and materials provided by Quant-Apps, including but not limited to designs, software, and code, are the property of Quant-Apps unless otherwise stated. You may not use, copy, reproduce, or distribute any materials without explicit written permission.

conduct.title: 4. User Conduct
conduct.content: You agree to use our website and services for lawful purposes only and will not:

list.1: Engage in any activity that disrupts or damages our website or services.
list.2: Attempt to access unauthorized areas of our website or servers.
list.3: Use our services for illegal, fraudulent, or harmful purposes.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Quant-Apps provides its services "as is" and "as available." While we strive for excellence, we do not guarantee that our website or services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or meet your expectations. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim all warranties, express or implied.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Quant-Apps shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our website or services. Our total liability to you shall not exceed the amount paid by you for services provided within the past six months.

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may include links to third-party websites. Quant-Apps is not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of these external sites.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to our website or services at our discretion, without prior notice, for any reason, including violation of these Terms.

governing.title: 9. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Moldova, Republic of. Any disputes arising out of or related to these Terms shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of Moldova, Republic of.

modifications.title: 10. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: Quant-Apps reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Updated Terms will be posted on our website, and continued use of our services indicates acceptance of any changes.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content:
For any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at:
Email: support@quant-apps.com

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Development
crossPlatform.text: We specialize in cross platform app development, creating high-performance mobile apps that run seamlessly on iOS app development and android app development. Using modern frameworks like React Native and Flutter, we deliver cost-effective, scalable, and user-friendly applications with a native-like experience, ensuring broad market reach, faster development, and streamlined maintenance. Learn about our development process to understand how we build exceptional cross-platform solutions.

support.title: Support & Maintenance
support.text: We provide ongoing support and maintenance to keep your frontend and backend development, applications, and websites running smoothly. Our support services include performance monitoring, security updates, bug fixes, and feature enhancements to ensure optimal functionality, minimize downtime, and enhance user experience, allowing your business to stay secure, up-to-date, and scalable.

expert.title: Expert Software Solutions
expert.text: Our skilled professionals leverage deep industry expertise to build cutting-edge digital products. Staying ahead with the latest trends and best practices, we deliver innovative, scalable, and secure solutions tailored to your business needs. Meet our <aboutUs>expert team</aboutUs> of developers and designers.

client.title: Client-Focused Digital Strategy
client.text: We prioritize your business goals, customizing our web and mobile development services to align with your vision. Through strategic collaboration and deep market insights, we create user-centric solutions that drive engagement and success. Our <process>client-focused approach</process> ensures we deliver exactly what you need.

results.title: Results-Driven Development
results.text: Our core mission is to deliver measurable results. By combining technical expertise with creative problem-solving, we develop high-performance apps, websites, and CRM systems that enhance user experiences, boost efficiency, and accelerate business growth. Browse our <projects>portfolio of successful projects</projects> to see the results we've achieved.

partnership.title: Long-Term Digital Partnership
partnership.text: We believe in lasting client relationships, providing continuous support, maintenance, and updates for your digital products. Our commitment ensures seamless functionality, security, and performance, helping your business stay competitive and innovative. Interested in joining our team? Check out our <careers>career opportunities</careers>.

more.text: More reviews can be viewed on

services.question: What services does Quant-Apps provide?
services.answer: Quant-Apps specializes in mobile app development for iOS, Android app development, cross platform app development solutions with React Native, CRM development, UI/UX design, and logo creation. We offer customized digital solutions, from concept and design to full deployment and optimization.

custom.question: Can you build a custom app for my business?
custom.answer: Yes! We work closely with businesses to create iOS app development, custom android app development, and cross-platform solutions that align with your brand and unique needs. From startups to large companies, we develop apps that help you stand out. View our previous app projects to see examples of our work.

cost.question: How much does app development cost?
cost.answer: The cost of app development varies depending on the app's features, complexity, and requirements. We provide a transparent and customized estimate that fits your budget and goals for iOS app development, Android apps, cross platform app development solutions, and CRM systems. Our development process includes detailed cost planning.

unique.question: What sets Quant-Apps?
unique.answer: At Quant-Apps, we combine creativity with technical expertise. Our co-founder, Romas Gutsu, started his career as an iOS and Android app developer and gradually became the CEO, leading the company in creating innovative web app development services. Meanwhile, Veaceslav Soltan, our co-founder, began his career as a graphic designer and brought a unique approach to designing visually attractive and user-friendly corporate website development solutions. Learn more about our team and our approach.

platforms.question: What platforms do you develop for?
platforms.answer: Quant-Apps specializes in developing mobile applications for iOS, Android app development, cross-platform solutions using React Native, CRM systems, UI/UX design, and logo creation. We offer tailored ecommerce website development services, from concept and design to full deployment and optimization. Quant-Apps develops apps for iOS, Android, and provides cross platform app development solutions with a focus on excellent performance, security, and integration with the Apple and Android ecosystems. Check out our complete service offerings.

timeline.question: How long does it take to develop an app?
timeline.answer: Development time depends on the complexity and features of the app. Typically, it takes from 1 to 3 months, including the development of iOS, Android, flutter app development company solutions, CRM development, as well as design and testing. Our development timeline is optimized for efficiency without compromising quality.

support.question: Do you offer support after the app is launched?
support.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support and maintenance services even after your app is launched. Our team ensures that your build native mobile app stays updated, secure, and runs smoothly as iOS/Android updates or user needs evolve. We provide comprehensive frontend and backend development support. Read more about our maintenance services.

start.question: How do I get started with Quant-Apps?
start.answer: Getting started is simple! Contact us for a free consultation where we'll discuss your app idea, goals, and requirements. From there, we'll guide you through the saas development process and help bring your vision to life with our expertise in mobile app development. We're also always looking for talent to join our team - check out our open positions.
